full_summary:
=====================================

### Shared Services Canada Tender Notice

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Title:**
Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Tier 1 - Business Transformation Architect Level 3 and 2

**Reference Number:** cb-5349-62403286
**Date of Publication:** 2023-05-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-25T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-04
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-03

**contracting Entity:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC)

**Contact Information:**

- **Name:** Julie Bampton
- **Email:** <julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca>
- **Phone:** (613) 790-5915

**Notice Description:**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Tier 1 - Business Transformation Architect Level 3 and 2. This contract is open only to Tier 1 TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified for services in the National Capital Region.

**Scope of Work:**

This contract will involve the provision of Business Transformation Architect (BTA) services at Level 3 and 2. The successful bidder will provide these services to SSC for a period of one year, plus four option periods of one year each.

**Security Level:**

The contract will have a security level of Secret.

**Previous Contract:**

An incumbent, MDOS Consulting Inc., currently provides these services to SSC. The contract was awarded on February 7, 2022, and is valued at $490,420.00. The contract is set to expire on June 30, 2024.

**Invitation to Tender:**

A total of 16 bidders have been invited to submit a proposal, including:

* 4165047 CANADA INC.
* INNOVISION CONSULTING INC.
* MDOS CONSULTING INC.
* NATTIQ INC.
* And 11 other bidders in singular or joint ventures

**Submission Guidelines:**

Tender submissions must be received by May 25, 2023.

**Additional Information:**

This RFP document is available at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5349/notice-proposed-pro
